My Work

React Chat

This is a full stack MERN chat application. The application utilizes the Pusher Chatkit API to manage all of the chat activity on the front end and uses MongoDb on the backend to validate and store users.

  • React
  • MongoDB
  • Express
  • Node.js
  • Pusher Chatkit

Complete Package!


  • User interface inspired by the iMessage Chat Application
  • Chatrooms listed across the top of the screen.
  • Active chatroom highlighted in red.
  • Users listed vertically on left side of screen.
  • User presence (online / offline) shown adjacent to user.
  • Typing indicator let you know when other users are typing!

Register and Login


  • Register and login to the chat application.

Full Stack


  • User information is persisted to MongoDb
